rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: An open welcoming space with ample lighting from floor-to-ceiling windows, designed to greet visitors. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning entrance with the north-east direction for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious living room that merges seamlessly with a Mediterranean style dining area. Features high ceilings and floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light and ventilation, keeping within budget constraints while maintaining design elegance.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Compact yet functional kitchen space, designed with local materials and energy-efficient appliances, ensuring ease of maintenance and adherence to Indian building norms.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Small but essential room for storage and laundry, optimally placed near the kitchen and accessible from the living area.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated gym space with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring natural light. Compact design ensures functionality while aligning with Vastu principles of activity zones in the west section of the property.

openings.description: Large entrance door with built-in security features, positioned to enhance positive energy flow per Vastu.
